title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 175.7 - Compensation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 175.7 - Compensation

State Regulations
A real estate broker shall make it clear for which party he
is acting and he shall not receive compensation from more than one party except
with the full knowledge and consent of the broker's client. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
175.7

Amended

New

York State Register January 4, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 01, eff. 1/4/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
